trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows progress bar control.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controle de barra de progresso do Windows.

trans-unit.source: A ProgressBar control visually indicates the progress of a lengthy operation in one of three styles: - Segmented blocks that increase in steps from left to right.
trans-unit.target: Um controle ProgressBar visualmente indica o progresso de uma operação demorada em um dos três estilos:-segmentada blocos aumentam nas etapas da esquerda para a direita.

trans-unit.source: - A continuous bar that fills in from left to right.
trans-unit.target: -Uma barra contínua que preenche da esquerda para a direita.

trans-unit.source: - A block that scrolls across a ProgressBar in a marquee fashion.
trans-unit.target: -Um bloco que rola uma barra de progresso de uma maneira de marca de seleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Style%2A> property determines the style of ProgressBar that is displayed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Style%2A>propriedade determina o estilo de barra de progresso é exibida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the ProgressBar control can only be oriented horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o controle ProgressBar pode ser apenas orientado na horizontal.

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to create a vertically oriented ProgressBar, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de como criar uma ProgressBar orientação vertical, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer>

trans-unit.source: The ProgressBar control is typically used when an application performs tasks such as copying files or printing documents.
trans-unit.target: O controle ProgressBar normalmente é usado quando um aplicativo executa tarefas como a cópia de arquivos ou impressão de documentos.

trans-unit.source: Users of an application might consider an application unresponsive if there is no visual cue.
trans-unit.target: Os usuários de um aplicativo podem considerar um aplicativo sem resposta se não há nenhuma indicação visual.

trans-unit.source: By using the ProgressBar in your application, you alert the user that the application is performing a lengthy task and that the application is still responding.
trans-unit.target: Usando a barra de progresso em seu aplicativo, você alerta o usuário que o aplicativo está executando uma tarefa demorada e que o aplicativo ainda está respondendo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> properties define the range of values to represent the progress of a task.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>propriedades definem o intervalo de valores para representar o progresso de uma tarefa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property is typically set to a value of 0, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property is typically set to a value indicating the completion of a task.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>propriedade normalmente é definida como um valor de 0 e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>propriedade normalmente é definida como um valor que indica a conclusão de uma tarefa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, to properly display the progress when copying a group of files, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property could be set to the total number of files to be copied.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para exibir o progresso corretamente ao copiar um grupo de arquivos, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>propriedade pode ser definida como o número total de arquivos a serem copiados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property represents the progress that the application has made toward completing the operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade representa o progresso que fez o aplicativo para concluir a operação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value displayed by the ProgressBar only approximates the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor exibido pelo ProgressBar aproxima apenas o valor atual de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Based on the size of the ProgressBar, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property determines when to display the next block or increase the size of the bar.
trans-unit.target: Com base no tamanho da barra de progresso, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade determina a exibir o próximo bloco ou aumentar o tamanho da barra de.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: There are a number of ways to modify the value displayed by the ProgressBar other than changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: Há várias maneiras de modificar o valor exibido pelo ProgressBar diferente alterando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade diretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property to specify a specific value to increment the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property by, and then call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method to increment the value.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>propriedade para especificar um valor específico para incrementar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade e, em seguida, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>método para incrementar o valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>

trans-unit.source: To vary the increment value, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A> method and specify a value with which to increment the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para variar o valor de incremento, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A>método e especifique um valor com o qual incrementar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> changes for the ProgressBar will not be honored when visual styles are enabled on [!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/add/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)] and above.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>muda para a barra de progresso não será atendida quando estilos visuais são habilitados em [!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/add/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)] e acima.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property is set to 0, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property is set to 100, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property is set to 10.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>propriedade é definida como 0, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>propriedade será definida como 100 e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>estiver definida como 10.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control can accept data that the user drags onto it.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controle pode aceitar dados que o usuário arrasta para ele.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if drag-and-drop operations are allowed in the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se são permitidas operações de arrastar e soltar no controle; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a imagem de plano de fundo para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Setting the BackgroundImage has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: Definir o BackgroundImage não tem nenhum efeito na aparência do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: The current background image.
trans-unit.target: A imagem de plano de fundo atual.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImage*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImage*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImage*>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImage%2A> has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: Definir o que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImage%2A>não tem nenhum efeito na aparência do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the layout of the background image of the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o layout da imagem de plano de fundo da barra de progresso.

trans-unit.source: Setting the BackgroundImageLayout property has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Definindo a propriedade BackgroundImageLayout não tem nenhum efeito na aparência do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImageLayout*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImageLayout*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImageLayout*>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> property has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>propriedade não tem nenhum efeito na aparência do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control, when it receives focus, causes validation to be performed on any controls that require validation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controle quando ele recebe o foco, faz com que a validação seja executada em todos os controles que exigem validação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control, when it receives focus, causes validation to be performed on any controls that require validation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle quando ele recebe o foco, faz com que a validação seja executada em todos os controles que exigem validação; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.CausesValidation*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.CausesValidation*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.CausesValidation*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle for the control.
trans-unit.target: Cria um identificador para o controle.

trans-unit.source: Overrides <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Substitui <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Information needed when you create a control.
trans-unit.target: Informações necessárias quando você cria um controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default Input Method Editor (IME) mode supported by the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o modo do Editor de método de entrada (IME) padrão suportado pelo controle.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho padrão do controle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa o tamanho padrão do controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should redraw its surface using a secondary buffer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controle deve redesenhar sua superfície usando um buffer secundário.

trans-unit.source: Setting the DoubleBuffered property has no effect on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Definindo a propriedade DoubleBuffered não tem nenhum efeito o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a secondary buffer should be used, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se um buffer secundário deve ser usado, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o usuário clica duas vezes no controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control does not raise the DoubleClick event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>controle não dispara o evento DoubleClick.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when focus enters the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o foco insere o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control cannot receive keyboard focus, so it never raises the Enter event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>controle não pode receber o foco do teclado, para que ele nunca gera o evento Enter.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of text in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a fonte do texto no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> of the text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> do texto.

trans-unit.source: The default is the font set by the container.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é a fonte definida pelo contêiner.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Font*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Font*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Font*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the input method editor (IME) for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"></xref>
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o editor de método de entrada (IME) para o<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"></xref>

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.ImeMode*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.ImeMode*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.ImeMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: Avança a posição atual da barra de progresso pelo valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: The Increment method enables you to increment the value of the progress bar by a specific amount.
trans-unit.target: O método de incremento permite que você incrementar o valor da barra de progresso em uma quantidade específica.

trans-unit.source: This method of incrementing the progress bar is similar to using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse método de incrementar a barra de progresso é semelhante ao uso de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>propriedade com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property specifies the current position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade especifica a posição atual de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: If, after calling the Increment method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property is greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property remains at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se, depois de chamar o método de incremento, os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade é maior que o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade permanece no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: If, after calling the Increment method with a negative value specified in the `value` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property remains at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se, depois de chamar o método de incremento com um valor negativo especificado no `value` parâmetro, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade é menor que o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade permanece no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> object whose style is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle> displays a continuously scrolling bar instead of its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>, calling Increment is unnecessary and will raise an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>objeto cujo estilo é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle>exibe uma barra de rolagem continuamente em vez de sua <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>incremento de chamada é desnecessário e gerará um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: The amount by which to increment the progress bar's current position.
trans-unit.target: O valor pelo qual incrementar a barra de progresso da atual posição.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Style*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle"></xref>
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Style*>está definida como <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle"> </xref> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Style*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user presses a key while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o usuário pressiona uma tecla enquanto o controle tem foco.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control cannot receive keyboard focus, so it never raises the KeyDown event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>controle não pode receber o foco do teclado, para que ele nunca gera o evento KeyDown.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user presses a key while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o usuário pressiona uma tecla enquanto o controle tem foco.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control cannot receive keyboard focus, so it never raises the KeyPress event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>controle não pode receber o foco do teclado, para que ele nunca gera o evento KeyPress.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user releases a key while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o usuário solta uma tecla enquanto o controle tem foco.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control cannot receive keyboard focus, so it never raises the KeyUp event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>controle não pode receber o foco do teclado, para que ele nunca gera o evento KeyUp.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when focus leaves the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o foco deixa o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control cannot receive keyboard focus, so it never raises the Leave event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>controle não pode receber o foco do teclado, para que ele nunca gera o evento de saída.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time period, in milliseconds, that it takes the progress block to scroll across the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o período de tempo, em milissegundos, que leva o bloco de andamento Role pela barra de progresso.

trans-unit.source: A marquee-style progress indicator does not display progress; instead it indicates that an operation is occurring by moving the progress block across the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: Um indicador de progresso de estilo da marca de seleção não mostra o andamento. em vez disso, ele indica que uma operação está ocorrendo, movendo o bloco de progresso na barra de progresso.

trans-unit.source: Since the marquee animation speed is a time period, setting the value to a higher number results in a slower speed and a lower number results in a faster speed.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez que a velocidade da animação do letreiro é um período de tempo, definindo o valor como um resultados de número mais alto em uma velocidade mais lenta e um resultados de número inferior em uma velocidade mais rápida.

trans-unit.source: The time period, in milliseconds, that it takes the progress block to scroll across the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: O período de tempo, em milissegundos, que leva o bloco de andamento Role pela barra de progresso.

trans-unit.source: The indicated time period is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O período de tempo indicado é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum value of the range of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor máximo do intervalo do controle.

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the upper limit of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade especifica o limite superior do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the Maximum property is changed, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor da propriedade máximo é alterado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>controle é redesenhado para refletir o novo intervalo de controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property is equal to the value of the Maximum property, the progress bar is completely filled.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>é igual ao valor da propriedade máximo, a barra de progresso é completamente preenchida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to specify a value to which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property must be set (by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property or using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> methods) to indicate that an operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para especificar um valor para o qual o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade deve ser definida (definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade ou usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>métodos) para indicar que uma operação é concluída.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can set the value of the Maximum property to the total number of files in a file copy operation.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode definir o valor da propriedade máximo para o número total de arquivos em uma operação de cópia de arquivo.

trans-unit.source: Each time a file is copied, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property can be increased by 1 until the total number of files is copied.
trans-unit.target: Cada vez que um arquivo é copiado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade pode ser aumentada em 1 até que o número total de arquivos é copiado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: At that point, the progress bar would be completely filled.
trans-unit.target: Nesse ponto, a barra de progresso deve ser totalmente preenchida.

trans-unit.source: The maximum value of the range.
trans-unit.target: O valor máximo do intervalo.

trans-unit.source: The default is 100.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 100.

trans-unit.source: The value specified is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum value of the range of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor mínimo do intervalo do controle.

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the lower limit of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade especifica o limite inferior do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the Minimum property is changed, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor da propriedade mínimo é alterado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>controle é redesenhado para refletir o novo intervalo de controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property is equal to the value of the Minimum property, the progress bar is empty.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>é igual ao valor da propriedade mínimo, a barra de progresso está vazia.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the value of the progress bar, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A> method, or set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar o valor da barra de progresso, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>propriedade com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>método, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A>método, ou defina o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade diretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>

trans-unit.source: The minimum value of the range.
trans-unit.target: O valor mínimo do intervalo.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: The value specified for the property is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado para a propriedade é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o usuário clica duas vezes no controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control does not raise the MouseDoubleClick event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>controle não dispara o evento MouseDoubleClick.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnBackColorChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnBackColorChanged também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColorChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColorChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnForeColorChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnForeColorChanged também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> changes will not be honored when visual styles are enabled and the operating system supports visual styles.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>alterações não serão cumpridas quando estilos visuais são ativados e o sistema operacional oferece suporte a estilos visuais.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Overrides <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated*>
trans-unit.target: Substituições<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated*></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleDestroyed"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnHandleDestroyed method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnHandleDestroyed também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.RightToLeftLayout*> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.RightToLeftLayout*>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.RightToLeftLayout*>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnRightToLeftLayoutChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnRightToLeftLayoutChanged também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the space between the edges of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"></xref> control and its contents.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o espaço entre as bordas de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"> </xref> controle e seu conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: Setting the Padding property will have no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: Definindo a propriedade de preenchimento não terá nenhum efeito na aparência do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Padding*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Padding*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Padding*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"></xref> is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"> </xref> é desenhada.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the amount of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step*> property.
trans-unit.target: Avança a posição atual da barra de progresso pela quantidade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step*>

trans-unit.source: The PerformStep method increments the value of the progress bar by the amount specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O método PerformStep incrementa o valor da barra de progresso com o valor especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property to specify the amount that each completed task in an operation changes the value of the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>propriedade para especificar a quantidade que cada tarefa concluída em uma operação altera o valor da barra de progresso.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are copying a group of files, you might want to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property to 1 and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property to the total number of files to copy.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você estiver copiando um grupo de arquivos, você talvez queira definir o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>1 e o valor da propriedade a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>propriedade para o número total de arquivos a serem copiados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>

trans-unit.source: When each file is copied, you can call the PerformStep method to increment the progress bar by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando cada arquivo é copiado, você pode chamar o método PerformStep para aumentar o valor da barra de progresso de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to have more flexible control of the value of the progress bar, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A> method or set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser ter um controle mais flexível, o valor da barra de progresso, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A>método ou defina o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade diretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property specifies the current position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade especifica a posição atual de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: If, after calling the PerformStep method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property is greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property remains at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se, depois de chamar o método PerformStep, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade é maior que o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade permanece no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: If, after calling the PerformStep method with a negative value specified in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property remains at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se, depois de chamar o método PerformStep com um valor negativo especificado em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade é menor que o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade permanece no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> object whose style is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle> displays a continuously scrolling bar instead of its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>, calling PerformStep is unnecessary and will raise an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>objeto cujo estilo é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle>exibe uma barra de rolagem continuamente em vez de sua <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>chamada de PerformStep é desnecessário e gerará um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Style*> is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Style*>is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Style*>

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor*> to its default value.
trans-unit.target: Redefine o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor*>para seu valor padrão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor*>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method will reset the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Highlight%2A> unless the method is overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método redefinirá o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>para <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Highlight%2A>, a menos que o método é substituído na classe derivada.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Highlight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ResetForeColor method is useful when you create a designer for the control, or you are creating your own control that incorporates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: O método ResetForeColor é útil quando você criar um designer para o controle, ou você está criando seu próprio controle que incorpora <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"></xref> and any text it contains is displayed from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"> </xref> e contém o texto é exibido da direita para esquerda.

trans-unit.source: The RightToLeftLayout property is useful when creating an application for use with languages that read from right to left.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade RightToLeftLayout é útil ao criar um aplicativo para uso com idiomas que são lidos da direita para esquerda.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"></xref> is displayed from right to left; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"> </xref> exibido da direita para a esquerda; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.RightToLeftLayout*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.RightToLeftLayout*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.RightToLeftLayout*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount by which a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep*> method increases the current position of the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a quantidade pela qual uma chamada para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep*>método aumenta a posição atual da barra de progresso.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep*>

trans-unit.source: You can use the Step property to specify the amount that each completed task in an operation changes the value of the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar a propriedade de etapa para especificar a quantidade de cada tarefa concluída em uma operação altera o valor da barra de progresso.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are copying a group of files, you might want to set the value of the Step property to 1 and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property to the total number of files to copy.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você estiver copiando um grupo de arquivos, você talvez queira definir o valor da propriedade etapa 1 e o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>propriedade para o número total de arquivos a serem copiados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: When each file is copied, you can call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method to increment the progress bar by the value of the Step property.
trans-unit.target: Quando cada arquivo é copiado, você pode chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>método para aumentar o valor da propriedade etapa a barra de progresso.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to have more flexible control of the value of the progress bar, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A> method or set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser ter um controle mais flexível, o valor da barra de progresso, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A>método ou defina o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade diretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A>

trans-unit.source: The amount by which to increment the progress bar with each call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep*> method.
trans-unit.target: O valor pelo qual incrementar a barra de progresso com cada chamada para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep*>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep*>

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 10.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the manner in which progress should be indicated on the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a maneira na qual o andamento deve ser indicado na barra de progresso.

trans-unit.source: You can use the marquee style when you need to indicate progress is being made, without indicating the quantity of progress.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o estilo da marca de seleção quando você precisa indicar progresso está sendo feito, sem que indica a quantidade de progresso.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle> style is honored only when visual styles are enabled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle>estilo é respeitado apenas quando os estilos visuais estão habilitados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle> style is honored when visual styles are not enabled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle>estilo é cumprido quando os estilos visuais não estão habilitados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle"></xref>
trans-unit.target: O padrão é<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle"></xref>

trans-unit.source: The value is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: O valor não é um membro do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Overrides <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*>.
trans-unit.target: Substituições <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*>

trans-unit.source: true if the user can set the focus to the control by using the TAB key; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: True se o usuário pode definir o foco para o controle usando a tecla TAB; Caso contrário, false.

trans-unit.source: The default is true.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é true.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.TabStop*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.TabStop*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.TabStop*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto associado a este controle.

trans-unit.source: The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: O texto associado a este controle.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Text*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Text*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Text*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The return string includes the type and the values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres de retorno inclui o tipo e os valores para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current position of the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a posição atual da barra de progresso.

trans-unit.source: The minimum and maximum values of the Value property are specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Os valores mínimo e máximo da propriedade Value são especificados pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to increment or decrement the value of the progress bar directly.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade permite que você incrementar ou decrementar o valor do progresso da barra diretamente.

trans-unit.source: To perform consistent increases in the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para executar um aumento consistente no valor do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>controle que você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>propriedade com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: To increase the progress bar value by varying amounts, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para aumentar o valor de barra de progresso com vários valores, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position within the range of the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: A posição dentro do intervalo da barra de progresso.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: The value specified is greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum*> property. -or- The value specified is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum*> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado é maior que o valor da <> </> *> propriedade. - ou - o valor especificado é menor que o valor da <> </> *> propriedade.
